---
title: Loggin in
categories: []
---
After receiving your credentials, you can login via www.ithenticate.com, clicking on the ‘Login’ button in the top right corner.
!(public/manuals/ithenticate/Picture 1.png)

You can sign in using your VU email address and password. Note that the ‘Sign Up’ option is not available to create an account yourself, as the VU has a campus license for PhD candidates. You can create an account by contacting the key user iThenticate within your faculty. A list of key users per faculty can be found here: (https://libguides.vu.nl/c.php?g=714180&p=5167373)
!(public/manuals/ithenticate/2.png)

After a successful login the start screen of the iThenticate app appears: 
!(public/manuals/ithenticate/3.png)
